monsters.name: Level 1 Druid
traits: Spellcasting
The druid can cast prepared druid spells using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 12
+4 to hit with spell attacks). The druid can cast prepared spells requiring a material component without the need for those components.
Druidic
The druid knows Druidic
the secret language of druids. The druid can speak the language and use it to leave hidden messages. Others can only spot the message's presence with a successful DC 15 Wisdom (Perception) check
but can't decipher it without magic.

actions.one target. Hit: 1d6 bludgeoning damage (1d8 if used with two hands).

monsters.name: Level 1 Fighter
traits: While the fighter is wearing armor
they gain a +1 bonus to AC.
Second Wind
The fighter can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + 1 (once per short or long rest).

actions.one target. Hit: 1d8 + 3 slashing damage (1d10 + 3 if used with two hands).

monsters.name: Level 1 Ranger
traits: Favored Enemy
The ranger has advantage on Wisdom (Survival) checks to track a favored enemy and on Intelligence checks to recall information about them.
Natural Explorer
The ranger has advantage on initiative rolls. On their first turn during combat
they have advantage on attack rolls against creatures that have not yet acted.

monsters.name: Level 1 Barbarian
traits: Rage (2/day)
As a bonus action
the barbarian can enter a rage for up to 1 minute. While raging
the barbarian has advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws
gains a +2 bonus to the damage of melee weapon attacks using Strength
and has resistance to bludgeoning
piercing
and slashing damage. The rage ends early if the barbarian is knocked unconscious or if their turn ends and they haven't attacked a hostile creature or taken damage since their last turn.
Unarmored Defense
While not wearing armor
the barbarian's AC equals 10 + their Dexterity modifier + their Constitution modifier (AC 14).

monsters.name: Kaukas I
monsters.damage_resistances: Necrotic, Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from Nonmagical Attacks

spells.name: Grave Sink (Recharge 5-6)
spells.desc: The Graveborn Boy digs a grave within 10 feet of itself, causing a creature in that area to make a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be restrained as the earth swallows them. The creature can use its action to make another Strength check to escape.

traits.name: Tree Refuge
traits.desc: The Graveborn Boy can merge into a tree trunk, becoming invisible and untargetable for up to 1 minute. While inside, it can attempt to pull a creature within 5 feet into the tree. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be trapped inside, taking 5 (1d10) necrotic damage per turn until they escape. The trapped creature can make a Strength (Athletics) check at the end of its turns to break free.

actions.name: Grave Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Earthen Grip
actions.desc: Ranged Attack: +4 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage and the target must make a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be restrained for 1 turn.

monsters.name: Mountain Witch
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, psychic, bludgeoning, piercing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Mountain Veil
traits.desc: While standing on rocky or mountainous terrain, the witch can use her bonus action to become lightly obscured, granting creatures disadvantage on Perception checks to see her until the start of her next turn.

actions.name: Clawing Curse
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage and the target must make a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or suffer disadvantage on their next attack roll.

actions.name: Shard Volley
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage as jagged stones fly at the target.

actions.name: Howling Winds (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The witch conjures a storm of sharp winds and debris within 20 feet of herself. Creatures in the area must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or take 12 (3d6 + 3) slashing damage and be blinded until the end of their next turn.

reactions.name: Earthen Dodge
reactions.desc: When a creature the witch can see attacks her, she can merge partially into the ground as a reaction, gaining +2 AC against the attack.

spells: The witch is a natural spellcaster, using Intelligence spell save DC 13, +5 hit.

spells.Cantrips (at will): minor illusion, mold earth, thorn whip

traits.name: Fighting Style - Defense
traits.desc: While the fighter is wearing armor, they gain a +1 bonus to AC.

traits.name: Second Wind
traits.desc: The fighter can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + 2 (once per short or long rest).

traits.name: Action Surge (1/short rest)
traits.desc: On their turn, the fighter can take one additional action. This can be used once per short or long rest.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 10 ft. (melee) or range 20/60 ft. (ranged), one target. Hit: 7 (1d8+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shield Bash (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Fighting Style - Defense
traits.desc: While the fighter is wearing armor, they gain a +1 bonus to AC.

traits.name: Second Wind
traits.desc: The fighter can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + 2 (once per short or long rest).

traits.name: Action Surge (1/short rest)
traits.desc: On their turn, the fighter can take one additional action. This can be used once per short or long rest.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 10 ft. (melee) or range 20/60 ft. (ranged), one target. Hit: 7 (1d8+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shield Bash (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Aura of Resolve
traits.desc: Friendly creatures within 10 feet of the knight gain advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

traits.name: Relentless Vanguard
traits.desc: If the knight reduces a creature to 0 hit points, they can move up to 15 feet as a reaction without provoking opportunity attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10+4) slashing damage, or 10 (1d12+4) if used with two hands.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shield Bash (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6+4) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

reactions.name: Defensive Formation
reactions.desc: When an ally within 5 feet of the knight is targeted by an attack, the knight can use their reaction to impose disadvantage on the attack roll.

traits.name: Archer's Eye (2/Day)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the archer can gain advantage on the next ranged weapon attack they make before the end of their turn.

traits.name: Quick Draw
traits.desc: The archer can draw or stow a weapon as part of the same action they use to attack.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) slashing damage.

reactions.name: Step Back
reactions.desc: When a creature moves within 5 feet of the archer, the archer can use their reaction to move 5 feet away without provoking opportunity attacks.

traits.name: Ferocious Charge
traits.desc: If the knight moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and hits with a melee weapon attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) slashing damage and must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Duelist Instinct
traits.desc: When the knight has no other creature within 5 feet of them except their target, their weapon attacks deal an extra 3 (1d6) damage.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6+5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Throwing Axe (2/Day)
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8+4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Reckless Cleave (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The knight swings wildly in a horizontal arc. Each creature within 5 feet of the knight must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or take 11 (2d6+4) slashing damage.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: When a creature the knight can see hits them with a melee attack, the knight can use their reaction to add +2 to their AC against that attack.

monsters.name: Arcanith the Unseen

spells.Spellcasting: Arcanith is a 5th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks).

spells.Cantrips (at will): Fire Bolt, Minor Illusion, Mage Hand, Prestidigitation

traits: Arcane Recovery
Once per day after a short rest
Arcanith can recover a number of spell slots with a combined level equal to or less than 3.
Sculpt Spells
When Arcanith casts a spell that affects an area
he can choose up to two creatures within the area to automatically succeed on their saving throw and take no damage.
actions: Arcanith hurls a sphere of fire that explodes in a 20-ft radius. Each creature in the area must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw
taking 28 (8d6) fire damage on a failed save
or half as much on a success.
legendary_actions: Arcanith can cast Shield as a reaction to protect himself from an attack
Arcanith can cast a 1st-level spell he knows without expending a spell slot.
reactions: When a creature within 60 feet casts a spell
Arcanith can use his reaction to attempt to negate it.
